properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
In the morning, when I rise
In the morning, when I rise
In the morning, when I rise

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Give me Jesus.
Give me Jesus,
Give me Jesus.
You can have all this world,
Just give me Jesus.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Dark mid-night was my cry,
Dark mid-night was my cry,
Dark midnight was my cry,
Give me Jesus.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Just about the break of day,
Just about the break of day,
Just about the break of day,
Give me Jesus.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Oh, when I come to die,
Oh, when I come to die,
Oh, when I come to die,
Give me Jesus.
